subject: Rajasthan History
A_en: Rajasthan was formed in 1949 after the merger of several princely states.
A_hi: 1949 में बहुत से मंगलवाल धर्मन स्वतंत्रता के साथ Rajasthan राज्य बन गई थी।
B_en: Rajasthan was formed in 1949 due to the merger of several princely states in North India.
B_hi: North India में बहुत से मंगलवाल धर्मन स्वतंत्रता के साथ Rajasthan राज्य बन गई थी।
C_en: The formation of Rajasthan was due to the merger of several princely states in the year 1949.
C_hi: 1949 के मैंने बने वर्षीय प्रांतराई के साथ Rajasthan राज्य बन गई थी।
D_en: Rajasthan was formed due to the integration of several princely states in the year 1949.
D_hi: 1949 के प्रांतराई से Rajasthan राज्य बने थे।
E_en: The formation of Rajasthan was a result of the amalgamation of various princely states in 1949.
F_en: Rajasthan was formed due to the consolidation of numerous princely states in the year 1949.
G_en: The establishment of Rajasthan happened as a result of the integration of various princely states in the year 1949.
H_en: Rajasthan was formed due to the integration of several princely states in the year 1949.
